name: Burning Prophet
originalText: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Burning Prophet gets +1/+0 until end of turn, then scry 1.

rulings.text: Burning Prophet’s ability resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered.

text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Burning Prophet gets +1/+0 until end of turn, then scry 1.
